code: @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     AnnotationConfigApplicationContext context = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext().     context.register(WebConfig.class).     context.refresh().     this.client = WebTestClient.bindToApplicationContext(context).build(). }
@Test public void test() throws Exception {     this.client.get().uri("/test").exchange().expectStatus().isOk().expectBody(String.class).isEqualTo("It works!"). }
@Bean public TestController controller() {     return new TestController(). }
